main.name: David Dobbins
main.description: I have over 6 years of experience as Software Engineer. Developing in the Full stack of applications
main.bio: Instead of having me work on a coding challenge, I say tell me about a bug you have a let me find it. and I will find it! Debuging and troubleshooting are my bread and butter.When I am not working I enjoy spending time with my family outdoors, hiking and riding bikes.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Along with my hard skills, I have soft skills in communicating clear with teammates and clients. I am easy to work with and adapt quicking to changes.

education.description: Graduated with Highest Honors, Learned essential skills for Software Development.
Graduated with a General Diploma one year early.

work.title: Software Engineer (.Net)
work.description: Working with Client to create B2B app in .Net, Kentico, React(typescript),Azure.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Web application using C#.Net MVC, JS, Sql. Creating Development Tools, building and maintaining Windows Services. and Creating custom workflow actions for clients.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Multiple DotNetNuke Websites in VB.Net, JS, and SQL. Desktop applications using VB.Net, and WPF. SQL. as well as General IT work

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
